Titles.Display: Olana State Historic Site, Hudson, New York, United States ; Alternate: Frederick Church House ; Alternate: Olana, Frederick Church House ; Alternate: F.E. Church Residence

Title.term: Olana State Historic Site, Hudson, New York, United States

Location.term: Hudson, Columbia, New York, United States

Agents.Display: Vaux, Calvert (1824-1895, American) architect ; Church, Frederick Edwin (1826-1900, American) designer

Note.term: Historic site designed by landscape painter Frederick Church that consists of his house and 250 acres of grounds. House was built 1870-1872 with Calvert Vaux as architect, and renovated 1885-1891.

ScopeNote.notesText: Verwijst naar gezichten die van een grotere afstand zijn genomen en die meestal een totaalbeeld van de indeling, het ontwerp of de plattegrond geven.

Contributor.fullName: Bureau AAT, RKD (Netherlands Institute for Art History; The Hague, The Netherlands)

ScopeNote.notesText: Se refiere a vistas tomadas a distancia, que típicamente muestran un esquema, diseño o plan general.

Contributor.fullName: Centro de Documentación de Bienes Patrimoniales (Dirección de Bibliotecas, Archivos y Museos; Santiago, Chile)
